overview: Burr is currently CFO and manages operations for CatchFree, Inc.. Most recently, Burr was CFO of AMSOLAR Corporation, a San Diego based developer of photovoltaic solar power systems where he led all project finance, corporate finance, tax, legal and accounting activities. Prior to AMSOLAR, he was a senior member of Barclays Capitalâ€™s and Lehman Brothersâ€™ west coast investment banking practices, working closely with corporate and private equity clients. Prior to joining Lehman Brothers, Dalton worked with Citigroup Capital Markets, advising privately held, middle market business owners. Dalton is a CPA and began his career as an auditor with Ernst & Young. He holds an MBA from Duke University and earned a B.S. in Accounting from the University of Southern California. Burr lives in Manhattan Beach, CA and is married with two children.
